documents.document: @bewarethefish @badtom no, nor me - am working later than expected.
@plinythemidlkid and the acting Immigration and Customs Enforcement director, Ragsdale.
@bad_emma_bad Ah.They always know. As soon as said cat is lulled into a false sense of security and comes inside, lock all exits!
@kittengloves and hung out to dry by his father (cough). I wonder what Fred would make of this?
@StuFlemingNZ I now have the theme as an earworm
@bad_emma_bad rustle a bag of Temptations ;-)

@bad_emma_bad it's like the mother cat picking up the kitten on the back of the neck (supposedly) and the cat relaxes*
*not guaranteed
@bad_emma_bad peg on the neck? (cat not toddler)
@nzJayZee yes it was! :)
@nzJayZee see you on the flip side!
@nzJayZee hmmm, not sure I remember that one, but that's a cracking old-school narrator voice. Right I need to call it quits for the night!
@nzJayZee it is Thigmund the Theamonthter, yes! Was having a retro moment.
@nzJayZee get a lot of mangled spaniards in chch then? 😉
@nzJayZee @gilfer that is indeed excellent!
@nzJayZee I think your time has come...
@nzJayZee ha! Although possibly more e or special k alphabet generation...
@nzJayZee *saunterers (I changed that twice!)
@nzJayZee I suspect the pension day sauntered would be more comfortable with Neil Diamond.
@nzJayZee I should patent it before it's turned into a craft beer.
@nzJayZee 6pm perky loop with Men at Work and Zed. Can't spot FFD, but can't deny it was there either ;-)
@GrumpyYetAmusin there's rather a lot of buzzy easy listening music...
When you inadvertently record your trip to the supermarket on your phone. If you need any ambient supermarket background noise, hmu.
@adriankingston @librarykris I like it's broader category <projectiles with nonexplosive propellant>

@paulbrislen When I left NZ in 1995, I took ten tapes(!) with me and four of them were Front Lawn and Mutton Birds. They saved me.
@paulbrislen I think the word absofuckenlutely is appropriate here.
@Jacobunny not ALL of them are on there. Or there wasn't a vid for CR.

@plinythemidlkid except that version has sound! So reposting.
@nikinajar @wellykowhai with a sub-set of those doing both, presumably!
@wellykowhai @nikinajar mates. But there are still historical / random tensions. Families are weird.
@wellykowhai @nikinajar Ha! I escape to the loo frequently. Although, I am super lucky in that we are a large family and yet we're all good
@nikinajar also: neat. ☄️🔥🥀⛑
@nikinajar If it wasn't the initial point, I'd say wine stat! Delayed processing of grief is such an odd experience (from my own), kia kaha!
@nikinajar Do you find yourself falling into old patterns of behaviour? Exhausting (but interesting!) to skew them a little.
@TracieAlmond I considered that as an option.
@Jo__Scully Part of your 5 a day?
@tklauren it is totally thriller bear!
@Jo__Scully yep. I really wanted to be able to pick it up (while driving obv) and throw it back in his window (while driving obv).
